revised_title: Atmospheric Oscillations and the Semi-Diurnal Barometer Variation
tldr: This article discusses the oscillations of an atmosphere with varying temperature gradients and their relation to the semi-diurnal variation of the barometer. The author explores different types of oscillations, including longitudinal waves and the influence of temperature on atmospheric oscillations. The study also examines the connection between the semi-diurnal variation of the barometer and the oscillations of the Earth's atmosphere as a whole.
